verses.roman:
tāṅra prema-vaśa āmi, tāṅra sevā--dharma
tāhā chāḍi' kariyāchi vātulera karma

synonyms: tāṅra prema-vaśa—subordinate to her love; āmi—I; tāṅra sevā—her service; dharma—My religion; tāhā chāḍi'-giving up that; kariyāchi—I performed; vātulera karma—the acts of a madman.
translation: "I am subordinate to the love of My mother, and it is My duty to serve her in return. Instead of doing so, I have accepted this renounced order. Certainly this is the act of a madman.
